column1: Madoc "Proudneck" Brandybuck was a Hobbits of Buckland.
Madoc was the son of Gormadoc Brandybuck and Malva Headstrong. He married to Hanna Goldworthy and was the father of Marmadoc Brandybuck. He served as Master of Buckland between  and .
wikipedia:Madoc is a Celtic name of unknown origin.
